subject: Re: Speakjet board
author: dead.science
full_text:
--Hi Frank.
When my chip gets here I am going to take an emf meter (KII) and use
the outputs that power the l.e.d's to change the status lines on the
Speakjet chip.  I am also going to try the white noise via a a to d
converter.  If the clock pulse is fast enough the white noise should
be close to true random even after an a to d converter.
Rob.
Dead Science.
